ISSUE.TITLE: Not able to build podman with Golang version (1.18) specified in go.mod
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Description Building podman from source failed - one package reported error that golang version is too old. ### Steps to reproduce the issue Steps to reproduce the issue 1. make sure you have go 1.18 or 1.19. 1. clone latest podman (e.g. https://github.com/containers/podman/commit/07834ab39e92b7f292be808ae5ed69d67c1f9bee) 2. build from source 3. build failed due to `go-dockerclient` ### Describe the results you received Error appears: ```sh ➜ podman git:(main) make BUILDTAGS="seccomp systemd" PREFIX=/usr CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm go build \ \ -ldflags '-X github.com/containers/podman/v4/libpod/define.gitCommit=2258329769c03561b07722ec3ab412bb9f977728 -X github.com/containers/podman/v4/libpod/define.buildInfo=1702658926 -X github.com/containers/podman/v4/libpod/config._installPrefix=/usr -X github.com/containers/podman/v4/libpod/config._etcDir=/etc -X github.com/containers/podman/v4/pkg/systemd/quadlet._binDir=/usr/bin -X github.com/containers/common/pkg/config.additionalHelperBinariesDir= ' \ -tags "seccomp systemd" \ -o bin/podman ./cmd/podman # github.com/fsouza/go-dockerclient vendor/github.com/fsouza/go-dockerclient/client.go:514:18: undefined: context.Cause note: module requires Go 1.20 make: *** [Makefile:350: bin/podman] Error 2 ➜ podman git:(main) ``` ### Describe the results you expected build passed, binaries created ### podman info output ```yaml podman lastest commit https://github.com/containers/podman/commit/07834ab39e92b7f292be808ae5ed69d67c1f9bee raspberry pi (arm v6) debian bookworm (11) ``` ### Podman in a container No ### Privileged Or Rootless None ### Upstream Latest Release Yes ### Additional environment details raspberry pi debian bookworm (11) golang installed from apt (go 1.19) ### Additional information I've succeeded to build podman: removed golang from apt, installed newest go 1.21 from golang website -> podman build passed package `go-dockerclient` changed its minimal go version from 1.18 to 1.19 in v1.9.4, in this merge request: https://github.com/fsouza/go-dockerclient/pull/957 newest 1.10.0 version of the package (version specified in podman requirements) bumps golang version even further, and requires go 1.20

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #21049 from k9withabone/quadlet-ulimit-multiple quadlet container support multiple Ulimit options

COMMIT.MESSAGE: go.mod: require go 1.20 some of our dependencies already require it. [NO NEW TESTS NEEDED] Closes: https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/21048 Signed-off-by: Giuseppe Scrivano <gscrivan@redhat.com>
